array.string: <b:t>A</b:t> <b:ot tag="b">pack of 6 yoghurts</b:ot> <b:t>costs</b:t> <b:ot tag="a">£1.50,</b:ot> <b:t>and a </b:t> <b:ot tag="d">pack of 8 yoghurts</b:ot> <b:t>costs</b:t> <b:ot tag="c">£1.60.</b:ot> <b:t>Which pack is better value?</b:t>
<b:ot tag="a" enabled="no">£1.50</b:ot> <b:op op="÷" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="b" enabled="no">6 yoghurts</b:ot> <b:op op="=" /> <b:ot picker="yes" pickerTarget="27">27</b:ot> <b:t>per yoghurt</b:t>
<b:ot tag="c" enabled="no">£1.60</b:ot> <b:op op="÷" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="d" enabled="no">8 yoghurts</b:ot> <b:op op="=" /> <b:ot picker="yes" pickerTarget="20">20</b:ot> <b:t>per yoghurt</b:t>
<b:t>A</b:t> <b:ot tag="d" enabled="no">pack of 8 yoghurts</b:ot> <b:t>is better value for money.<b:t>
